text: -  Radiation therapy for small tumors in one area, followed by watchful waiting if there is tumor remaining after treatment.     -  Chemotherapy for larger tumors or tumors that have spread. If a tumor smaller than 3 centimeters remains after chemotherapy, watchful waiting follows. If a larger tumor remains after treatment, surgery or watchful waiting follow.
